text: KAT-TUN is a Japanese J-Pop band.KAT-TUN is an acronym. The group's name is an acronym formed by the members' surname initials. KAT-TUN stands for Kamenashi Kazuya, Akanishi Jin, Taguchi Junnosuke, Tanaka Koki, Ueda Tatsuya, Nakamaru Yuichi. ==History== The group is made up of six young Japanese men. Their debut was announced January 29, 2006. The debut was accompanied by a concert tour of Japan. They released a single ("Real Face"), an album ("Best of KAT- TUN"), and a DVD (Real Face Film) on the same day, March 22, 2006. KAT-TUN is now made up of three members: * Kamenashi Kazuya (born February 23, 1986) * Ueda Tatsuya (born October 4, 1983) * Nakamaru Yuichi (born September 4, 1983) Members who left the group: *Akanishi Jin (born July 4, 1984) * Tanaka Koki (born November 5, 1985) * Taguchi Junnosuke (born November 29, 1985) KAT-TUN not only sings and dances. KAT-TUN also acts. They will disband on 31 March 2025. ==References== Category:Japanese rock bands Category:J-pop music groups Category:Japanese boy bands
title: KAT-TUN
